name: test_e2e_with_logs[277_PATH_NGINX_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_NGINX_001` |
| **Name** | Nginx alias traversal |
| **Category** | PATH_TRAVERSAL |
| **Subcategory** | nginx_specific |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/static../etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fstatic..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~61000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:28.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] Basic path traversal attack detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] Basic path traversal attack detected test_id=PATH_NGINX_001-1772268928680-ocbao pattern_id=PATH_NGINX_001 uri=/?q=%2Fstatic..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
